title: How much MP camera does the Poco M2 have? - Quora

response.answer_text: Poco M2 has a decent camera that offers sharp and detailed images to the users. It comes with a quad rear camera setup with the specs of 13MP wide lends + an 8MP ultrawide lens + a 5MP macro lens + 2MP depth lens. Additional camera features include an LED flash, HDR and Panorama. It also comes with an 8MP wide lens selfie camera at the front with an LED flash.  It is a decent camera for an affordable mid-range device and suits the other features of the Poco M2 well.

The POCO M2 was launched on 8th September 2020 as the rebranded variant of the previously launched Redmi 9 Prime powered by the octa-core MediaTek Helio G80 gaming processor.  In terms of the optics department, the Poco M2 on the rear packs a 13 megapixel primary camera; a second 8 megapixel camera; a third 5 megapixel camera and a fourth 2 megapixel camera. The rear camera setup integrates the autofocus feature. It sports a 8-megapixel camera on the front for selfies and is neatly placed in the form of a waterdrop notch.
